name: Kings&Cities
description:
◦ Resources management
In Kings&Cities, resources are represented by gauges. Make your choices wisely, because if one of them falls to 0, it is the end of your leadership on Epeiros.

◦ Leader's quests
During your games, the ruler of your kingdom will send you quests. Complete them to obtain favors.



◦ Diplomacy
Relations with other kingdoms and empires fluctuate depending on your actions. Find powerful allies to help you but beware! Times are hard and betrayals are common.

◦ Cultures & Religions
The factions of Kings&Cities are separated into 5 cultures and 6 religions offering great replayability.
